Row.Text: Welcome to the Kingdom of Israel. I'm King David, may the Lord share blessings upon us both.
Well met, I'm King David of Israel, and I hope we won't need any unnecessary bloodshed.
May the Lord of heaven and earth give blessings to our lands. I'm King David of Israel.
So it shall be, prepare to face an army of the Lord.
The Lord of the Armies shall crush your pagan ways!
I pray to my Lord, so this war is not yours.
The Lord of Armies is with us, your defeat will soon come.
My Lord will bring justice upon thee.
My Lord has punished my people, but we shall return to the light.
This is the end, but my Lord will keep His covenant with His people.
My Lord, why have you forsaken me?
Hail to you.
Greetings.
Farewell.
Goodbye.
My people accept your proposition.
No, that won't be enough, your trade is unfair.
No...
My people doesn't agree with your proposition.
You're going to need more to make this fair...
No, my people disagree...
Very well, though we hope to be treated likewise in the future.
Your greed is only exceeded by your arrogance. We refuse your ridiculous demands.
My people and I have a proposal to make to you.
My people need your help, and we came to ask for it.
All right.
Very well.
Certainly not.
No.
I'm listening.
My people listen to you...
We salute you, friend.
You're welcome here, not a stranger.
Walk safely in your path.
May we meet again.
My people are always glad to welcome your proposals.
You understand that we need more than that, so please go on.
As much of a friend as you are, my people can't really accept that...
Near enough, but I'm afraid we need more.
I am afraid that your offer is not acceptable, my friend.
We shall help you, friend. But we hope to be treated likewise when we need your help.
Alas! I am afraid that we cannot accede to your request. You'll have to try to get by without our assistance at this time.
You have shown yourself a friend of my people, and now we are in dire need of your help.
The Qullana people need your help, great friend. We'll be eternally thankful.
Certainly.
We decline.
Of course not.
You know you may speak.
Well, here we are...
What business do you have here, vile one?
What do you want? You're not welcome here.
This has taken too long.
Our business here is done.
And so, you have finally done something reasonable and right...
Do you even understand the concept of 'fair trading'? Your offer is too light: you must improve it.
That's not good enough.
You must do better than that.
Much like yourself, your offer is offensive.
You may have what you asked for, but we shall demand retribution.
You will not have it...
We give you a change to return to harmony, will you take it?.
Show us you can fight for liberation, even if you didn't before...
So be it.
Always with such oppresive ideas... No...
That's unacceptable.
No.
Speak, if you must...
It is time my people made our stand against yours. Hallalla!
Justice demands your end, and we shall give it what it demands!
The time for retribution has come, and we shall find our freedom from you!
I expected no better from you. You will not find us unprepared.
The Qullana peopple will fight for our freedom, no matter who dies first!
And so it's come to this... Know that we will fight until the end!
